page.title: 13Solent Car Hire.
page.content: Solent Self Drive Car Hire comprises a fleet of ten cars which operate from a site at Pallance Gate on the edge of Parkhurst Forest.All the cars are Fords as these are considered to be the most reliable and familiar to the customers. Customers contact Solent Car Hire by phone and arrange to be met with a car. The cars are hired out for periods of one day or more. The customers are business people on the island or business people and holidaymakers from the mainland or abroad. Some people hire a car because their own is off the road.The company has been operating for five years and is kept very busy.
